channel.title: Slayer Interpretations
channel.description:
Angel Of Death--------------------------------Hey Johnny Depp
Ahhhhhhhhharghhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!!!!!!!
[Lyrics & Music - Hanneman]
Auschwitz, the meaning of pain-------------------Ouch Wrists, the meaning of pig The way that I want you to die-------------------The wig I want you to dye Slow death, immense decay-----------------------Slow, Deaf, he mends the gate Showers that cleanse you of your life--------------Shout to Clint "you'll do Life" Forced in-----------------------------------------Foreskin Like cattle----------------------------------------The Camel You run------------------------------------------You watch Stripped of---------------------------------------Dip Down Your life's worth----------------------------------You like work Human mice, for the Angel of Death----------------Humour Mice, for the age of the deaf Four hundred thousand more to die-----------------Thor of the Trouser War, TODAY! Angel of Death------------------------------------Hey Johnny Depp! Monarch to the kingdom of the dead---------------Monitor! The kindom of the Dell Sadistic, surgeon of demise------------------------Sir-Dis-Tik, Sure john of the mice Sadist of the noblest blood------------------------Sadie is a novelist, BLUD!
Destroying, without mercy-------------------------Destroying, With Hammer see? To benefit the Aryan race-------------------------Defending the aryan race
Surgery, with no anesthesia------------------------Sure Jerry, We know anesticia Feel the knife pierce you intensely------------------Even I missed you in tents, Lee Inferior, no use to mankind-------------------------Inferior! No ewe's to mankind Strapped down screaming out to die----------------Strapped Ice Cream, Enough to DIE! Angel of Death-------------------------------------Hey Johnny Depp Monarch to the kingdom of the dead----------------Mugger, Timmy, kill mom of the dead Infamous butcher,---------------------------------Infamous, Butcher Angel of Death-------------------------------------Hey johnny Depp
Pumped with fluid, inside your brain-----------------Purple Fluid, Excite your brie Pressure in your skull begins------------------------Pressuring these gothic gimps pushing through your eyes-------------------------Persian through your eyes Burning flesh, drips away---------------------------Sporting vest, Chocks away Test of heat burns your skin,-----------------------Tess in heat, persil skin your mind starts to boil----------------------------Your mime starts to boil Frigid cold, cracks your limbs-----------------------Freezing cold, Cracker lives How long can you last-----------------------------Along came your lass to this In this frozen water burial?------------------------Throw some water! Bery. Sewn together, joining heads----------------------Saucy Gellar, Jolie Heads Just a matter of time------------------------------Justin met a thai 'Til you rip yourselves apart------------------------Can you rent yourself a pub? Millions laid out in their----------------------------Beardsley out?....In there Crowded tombs------------------------------------Crowded tombs... Sickening ways to achieve-------------------------16 ways to add cheese The holocaust-------------------------------------to hot cobs Seas of blood, bury life----------------------------Seize her plod, Barry knight Smell your death as it burns-----------------------Smell your dad, acid burns Deep inside of you--------------------------------Deep inside of you Abacinate, eyes that bleed-----------------------A basket of eggs, Isaac please Praying for the end of-----------------------------Praying for the end of Your wide awake nightmare------------------------your wide-awake nightmare Wings of pain, reach out for you-------------------Window pane, reach out for ewe His face of death staring down,--------------------face of depp staring down Your blood's running cold--------------------------your blood's running cold Injecting cells, dying eyes-------------------------Check yo'selves. Die, Nice. Feeding on the screams of-------------------------Feeding them ice screams The mutants he's creating-------------------------of the mutant I created Pathetic harmless victims--------------------------Prosthetic, Armless victims Left to die----------------------------------------Left to dive Rancid Angel of Death-----------------------------Wraps it, a duel of death Flying free----------------------------------------Flying 3
[LEADS: HANNEMAN, KING, HANNEMAN, KING, HANNEMAN]
Angel of Death------------------------------------Age of the deaf Monarch to the kingdom of the dead---------------Monitor! the kingdom of the dell Infamous butcher,--------------------------------Infamous, Butcher Angel of Death-----------------------------------Age of the deaf
Angel of Death-----------------------------------Hey johnny depp!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Slayer Interpretations
item.dc:creator: @Hippie_Slay Hippie_Slay
item.description:
@Hippie_Slay wrote:

Angel Of Death--------------------------------Hey Johnny Depp

Ahhhhhhhhharghhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!!!

[Lyrics & Music - Hanneman]

Auschwitz, the meaning of pain-------------------Ouch Wrists, the meaning of pig
The way that I want you to die-------------------The wig I want you to dye
Slow death, immense decay-----------------------Slow, Deaf, he mends the gate
Showers that cleanse you of your life--------------Shout to Clint “you’ll do Life”
Forced in-----------------------------------------Foreskin
Like cattle----------------------------------------The Camel
You run------------------------------------------You watch
Stripped of---------------------------------------Dip Down
Your life’s worth----------------------------------You like work
Human mice, for the Angel of Death----------------Humour Mice, for the age of the deaf
Four hundred thousand more to die-----------------Thor of the Trouser War, TODAY!
Angel of Death------------------------------------Hey Johnny Depp!
Monarch to the kingdom of the dead---------------Monitor! The kindom of the Dell
Sadistic, surgeon of demise------------------------Sir-Dis-Tik, Sure john of the mice
Sadist of the noblest blood------------------------Sadie is a novelist, BLUD!

Destroying, without mercy-------------------------Destroying, With Hammer see?
To benefit the Aryan race-------------------------Defending the aryan race

Surgery, with no anesthesia------------------------Sure Jerry, We know anesticia
Feel the knife pierce you intensely------------------Even I missed you in tents, Lee
Inferior, no use to mankind-------------------------Inferior! No ewe’s to mankind
Strapped down screaming out to die----------------Strapped Ice Cream, Enough to DIE!
Angel of Death-------------------------------------Hey Johnny Depp
Monarch to the kingdom of the dead----------------Mugger, Timmy, kill mom of the dead
Infamous butcher,---------------------------------Infamous, Butcher
Angel of Death-------------------------------------Hey johnny Depp

Pumped with fluid, inside your brain-----------------Purple Fluid, Excite your brie
Pressure in your skull begins------------------------Pressuring these gothic gimps
pushing through your eyes-------------------------Persian through your eyes
Burning flesh, drips away---------------------------Sporting vest, Chocks away
Test of heat burns your skin,-----------------------Tess in heat, persil skin
your mind starts to boil----------------------------Your mime starts to boil
Frigid cold, cracks your limbs-----------------------Freezing cold, Cracker lives
How long can you last-----------------------------Along came your lass to this
In this frozen water burial?------------------------Throw some water! Bery.
Sewn together, joining heads----------------------Saucy Gellar, Jolie Heads
Just a matter of time------------------------------Justin met a thai
'Til you rip yourselves apart------------------------Can you rent yourself a pub?
Millions laid out in their----------------------------Beardsley out?..In there
Crowded tombs------------------------------------Crowded tombs…
Sickening ways to achieve-------------------------16 ways to add cheese
The holocaust-------------------------------------to hot cobs
Seas of blood, bury life----------------------------Seize her plod, Barry knight
Smell your death as it burns-----------------------Smell your dad, acid burns
Deep inside of you--------------------------------Deep inside of you
Abacinate, eyes that bleed-----------------------A basket of eggs, Isaac please
Praying for the end of-----------------------------Praying for the end of
Your wide awake nightmare------------------------your wide-awake nightmare
Wings of pain, reach out for you-------------------Window pane, reach out for ewe
His face of death staring down,--------------------face of depp staring down
Your blood’s running cold--------------------------your blood’s running cold
Injecting cells, dying eyes-------------------------Check yo’selves. Die, Nice.
Feeding on the screams of-------------------------Feeding them ice screams
The mutants he’s creating-------------------------of the mutant I created
Pathetic harmless victims--------------------------Prosthetic, Armless victims
Left to die----------------------------------------Left to dive
Rancid Angel of Death-----------------------------Wraps it, a duel of death
Flying free----------------------------------------Flying 3

[LEADS: HANNEMAN, KING, HANNEMAN, KING, HANNEMAN]

Angel of Death------------------------------------Age of the deaf
Monarch to the kingdom of the dead---------------Monitor! the kingdom of the dell
Infamous butcher,--------------------------------Infamous, Butcher
Angel of Death-----------------------------------Age of the deaf

Angel of Death-----------------------------------Hey johnny depp!!!
